additional [E] next turn.

stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliarPower.NAME: Find Familiar
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, gain Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:MagicMirrorPower.NAME: Magic Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive a debuff, apply that debuff to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:PrestidigitationPower.NAME: Prestidigitation

time.

stsjorbsmod:ReduceNextDamagePower.NAME: Reduce Damage

stsjorbsmod:SnappedPower.NAME: Snapped
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot remember any memories or clarities.

stsjorbsmod:CharityMemory.NAME: Charity
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases attack damage by #b!S!. Increases by an additional 1 for every !G! gold you have.

stsjorbsmod:ChastityMemory.NAME: Chastity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, lose !D! #yDexterity and gain !B! #yBlock.

stsjorbsmod:DiligenceMemory.NAME: Diligence
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Retain !M!.

stsjorbsmod:EnvyMemory.NAME: Envy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you target an enemy with a card, apply !M! #yVulnerable to that enemy.

stsjorbsmod:GreedMemory.NAME: Greed
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, gain !M! gold.

stsjorbsmod:GluttonyMemory.NAME: Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by !M!.

stsjorbsmod:HumilityMemory.NAME: Humility
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !M! #yThorns.

stsjorbsmod:KindnessMemory.NAME: Kindness
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! #yPoison.

stsjorbsmod:LustMemory.NAME: Lust
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attacks deal !P!% bonus damage. When you forget Lust, gain !W! Weak.

stsjorbsmod:PatienceMemory.NAME: Patience
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 #yCoil each time you play a card.

stsjorbsmod:PrideMemory.NAME: Pride
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, permanently #yUpgrade a card in your deck.

stsjorbsmod:SlothMemory.NAME: Sloth
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw !M! fewer cards each turn.

stsjorbsmod:TemperanceMemory.NAME: Temperance
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce #yStrength of ALL enemies by !M!.

stsjorbsmod:WrathMemory.NAME: Wrath
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy with an attack card, permanently increase that card's damage by !M!.
